<html><DIV>
<P>Well since someone has decided to kill me off as a member of this game and destroy all of my characters, I'm leaving, don't expect to see me back here ever again!<BR><BR></P></DIV>
<DIV></DIV>
<DIV></DIV>>From: robertdahl <RDAHL@...>

<DIV></DIV>> 
<DIV></DIV>>Sinnertwin continues plodding forward, and uses the momentum from his 
<DIV></DIV>>run to avoid the grenades, and narowly the after shock. He then growls 
<DIV></DIV>>as he notices his target has disapeared. He sniffs desperately for 
<DIV></DIV>>something, then transforms and quickly fires his grenade towards the 
<DIV></DIV>>smell. (I'm assuming you still smell when cloaked)
